HostRound ★SSD Web Hosting ★ D. Backup, Free SSL, Website Builder, 24x7 Support

HostRound LLC is a US-based web hosting provider found to stay ahead and provide unmatched service level with professional support.

We provide Web hosting and WordPress hosting in the USA with unmatched service level and top-notch and personalized support that cares about your success.

We also provide free Website Builder with premium features that allow you to build your professional looking and responsive website yourself with a few clicks, you can try our website builder DEMO.

Why HostRound Web Hosting?
- Websites hosted on 12 Cores / 24 Threads Intel Xeon E5 CPU Servers
- Pure SAMSUNG SSD storage for ultimate speed
- High Availability, Redundancy and Connectivity Failover (99.999% Uptime)
- Tier-3 Datacenter
- Daily backup in two secured locations
- FREE Website Builder with advanced features
- Free Migration from your old provider
- Install Apps with 1 Click
- PHP version and modules selector
- Native support for Wordpress, Joomla & Drupal + Free installation/migration
- Real-time protection against 4000+ exploit scripts
- Real-time protection against malware and viruses uploaded to your site via FTP/Browser/Email/File manager
- Free Cloudflare CDN service integrated with your hosting account
- Secured and isolated hosting environment with CloudLinux OS
- Pre-installed Git and WP-CLI
- Rebootless kernel updates for enhanced security & ZERO downtime
- Web & FTP upload protected against malicious software
- Two-factor authentication on cPanel login and client portal
- Professional Website Design, starting from $499.99 for 1-5 pages website.




Free Website Builder (Live Demo)
- Easy to use Drag & Drop Website Builder
- Mobile Friendly (Responsive Templates)
- SEO Friendly
- Photo Gallery
- Free photo library with 4000+ photos.
- Image Editor (Crop, Resize, Add Filters, Generate Thumbnails & more)
- Form Builder
- E-commerce (Shopping Cart) (Integrated with PayPal, Authorize.Net, and 2CheckOut)
- Restaurant Menu builder
- Event Calendar
- Google Maps
- Vote Poll
- Sitemap generator
- XML Sitemap generator
- Integrated with Google webmaster tools
- Integrated with Google Analytics
- FAQ and Help Center builder
- Live Chat
- Forums (Add a forum to your website with one click)
- A Blog (Add a beautiful blog to your website with one click)
- Downloadable Files (You can generate a file download button)
- Youtube videos (Add Youtube videos to your website)
and much more modules ready to be installed on your website with a click.
